prompt: Write a short story about artificial intelligence.
generated_text:
It must involve an intelligent computer program that interacts with the human characters.
This short story is intended to introduce you to the topic of artificial intelligence and to give you a glimpse of what it might be like to work with such a computer program.
You will write a short story in which you will introduce the reader to a character named John Smith. John Smith is a computer programmer who works for a company called XYZ Corporation. XYZ Corporation is a software company that develops computer programs for businesses and organizations.
The short story will take place in the year 2050. In 2050, artificial intelligence will be very advanced. You will describe how John Smith works with his company’s computer program to help XYZ Corporation’s clients solve their business problems.
